data.title: CVP named official Nikon video dealer
data.meta_description: CVP has been appointed by Nikon as an authorised video dealer. This partnership not only enhances CVP’s brand portfolio, reinforcing its commitment to ...
data.text:
CVP has been appointed by Nikon as an authorised video dealer. This partnership not only enhances CVP’s brand portfolio, reinforcing its commitment to supporting content creators with top-tier equipment, but also gives Nikon a platform to extend its reach in the fast-growing professional digital cinema camera market.

With the addition of Nikon’s lineup of cameras, lense, and accessories into its portfolio, CVP is now even better equipped to support the creative endeavours of its customers, underscoring its commitment to providing the best equipment and services in the market to filmmakers and videographers.

Jon Fry, CEO at CVP, said: “Our global reach combined with our passion for creativity and innovation positions CVP perfectly to make Nikon’s cutting-edge video products more accessible to both professionals and enthusiasts. This collaboration allows us to further empower content creators by providing them access to Nikon’s exceptional range of video equipment and accessories.”

Jake Cundy, NNE sales director, says: “Nikon is excited to partner with CVP, a cornerstone in the professional video and broadcast solutions industry, to expand our footprint in the digital cinema camera market. CVP’s dedication to innovation and customer-centric approach perfectly aligns with our mission to empower content creators with state-of-the-art video equipment. We look forward to a fruitful collaboration that will undoubtedly push the boundaries of visual storytelling.”
